CustomField.description:
Written as, e.g., 'scheduled a call'. The assignee or owner is prepended and any related contacts are appended to the string. Empty to remove.
- If 'SObject - Assignee Id' is configured, the name is prepended - If 'SObject - Related User Id' is configured, the name is appended
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Written as, e.g., 'scheduled a call'.
- If 'SObject - Assignee Id' is configured, the name is prepended - If 'SObject - Related User Id' is configured, the name is appended
CustomField.label: Future Tense - English
